music.label: Music Production
music.title: Crafting Electronic Experiences Since 1988
music.description: From underground warehouse parties to international festivals, creating immersive sonic journeys that transcend boundaries.
music.projects: 84 Glyde • Urban Jazz Naturals • Magnificent Lovers • Monad • SUB-STANCE

intro.heading: Event Poster Design & Visual Identity
description: Creating immersive visual experiences for electronic music events since 1988. From the Seven Virtues series to bold graphic designs for underground warehouse parties and festival culture.
Each piece combines symbolism, bold typography, and graphic design principles to capture the essence of the music and the moment.
